HENRY CEJUDO cemented his place as undisputed king of the bantamweights after beating all-time great Dominick Cruz - before announcing plans to walk away from the sport.
Cruz, the UFC's inaugural 135lb champion, stepped in on late notice to replace Jose Aldo… [+2999 chars]

articles.title: Solskjaer compares Jordan to a fearless United great - Manchester United
articles.description: Ole has been inspired by The Last Dance and admits the NBA legend is similar to an iconic former team-mate.
articles.content:
Meanwhile, from the squad, Aaron Wan-Bissaka revealed to us that he’s also been motivated by Jordan’s unrelenting desire to win at all costs. 
“I started watching The Last Dance, a big documentary about Michael Jordan and the Chicago Bulls,” the young defend… [+473 chars]

articles.author: By Mike Colman For Daily Mail Australia
articles.title: Mike Tyson pulls out of deal to fight Sonny Bill Williams in Australia - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tyson's management was negotiating with Australian promoters to take part in a multi-million dollar charity bout next year, but the former world champ pulled out after seeing Williams listed as an opponent.
articles.content:
Mike Tyson has 'dissed' Sonny Bill Williams, saying to fight the former All Black would be 'an insult to boxing'.
He said if and when he gets back into the ring it will be with a 'real' boxer, not a 'rugby player'.
Tyson's management had been negotiating wi… [+3982 chars]

articles.title: UFC 249: Francis Ngannou knocks Jairzinho Rozenstruik out cold in just 20 seconds – Daniel Cormier’s reaction - talkSPORT.com
articles.content:
At UFC 249, nobody thought Francis Ngannou and Jairzinho Rozenstruik were going to go the distance.
But not many people thought Rozenstruik would be knocked out cold inside just 20 seconds.
Jairzinho Rozenstruik was out cold after Francis Ngannou caught him… [+1927 chars]
